EmailTemplate.name: 2020_EMEAI_HOC_MC.2020_EMEAI_SaveTheDate_HOC_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date: 2020 Honeywell Operators Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Honeywell is delighted to invite you to our Annual Airlines Operator Conference for customers in Europe, Middle East, Africa and India.
The three-day workshop will take place between the 3rd and 5th of March 2020.
We are excited to meet you and will soon be sharing a formal invitation for the event, along with a detailed agenda.
In the meantime, please save the dates in your calendar and pre-register to attend the event.
We look forward to seeing you soon!
Honeywell Events Team
DATE March 3–5, 2020
TIME 10:00am - 5:00pm
LOCATION TBD
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/EMEAI_HOC_2020.html]]>
